Yes - and denies that the Bush administration neglected the war in Afghanistan once the campaign against Baghdad had begun. reports: A group of conservatives led by former Kansas Mike Pence Jim Ryun plan to start an independent expenditure campaign aimed at getting Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) to run for president. `` America's President Committee'' will begin a signature-gathering effort this week to encourage Mike Pence to get into the presidential race. Former Republican state Rahm Emanuel Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Rahm Emanuel Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear frontrunner and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said.`` I think he'd clear the field.''
